component.name: Blaze Hub
component.summary: Blaze Hub is a new appstore for your GNOME

description.p: Blaze Hub is a GTK4 and LibAdwaita built application store, based on flathub. It might appear familiar to the GNOME Software, but there are a few more features and differences.

- progress tab with network speed, (estimated) amount of downloaded data, (also estimated) total size to download - downloaded item also shows what packages it downloads - ability to choose between user's and system's installation - full-window screenshot preview on click, with ability to open in the ImageViewer
